description: Shard-aware tactical MMO built on a custom C# combat server and a Unity tactics client tuned for latency spikes.

paragraphs: C# drives a shard-aware combat backend with deterministic turn resolution, optimistic locking, and graceful degradation during peak concurrency.
The Unity tactics client streams delta snapshots, runs custom prediction for ability previews, and hot-reloads UI modules without kicking the session.
RETRO TAKEAWAY: TURN-DEADLINE TELEMETRY EXPOSED HIDDEN QUEUE PRESSURE AND LET US PATCH NETCODE BEFORE LIVE EVENTS.
